name: Lulzbot Taz Pro Dual 0.5 nozzle
machine_start_gcode:
;This G-Code has been translated from Cura startup from CuraLE 4.13.10 to OrcaSlicer by Wrathernaut
T0
M82; absolute extrusion mode
M73 P0; clear GLCD progress bar
M75; start GLCD timer
M107; disable fans
G90; absolute positioning
M420 S0; disable previous leveling matrix
M140 S{bed_temperature_initial_layer[initial_tool]}; begin bed temping up (w)
; soften temp for {filament_type[initial_tool}}
M104 R{if filament_type[initial_tool} == "EVA"}170
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} == "HIPS"}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} == "PET"}170
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} == "PHA"}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} == "SBS"}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /^ABS.*/}190
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /^ASA.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /^PA.*|NYLON|CoPA/}220
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /^PC-.*|^PC/}220
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /PE|PE-CF|PET-CF/}190
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /^PETG.*|PCTG.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /^PLA.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /^PP.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /PVA|PVB|BVOH/}180
{elsif filament_type[initial_tool} =~ /TPU|TPE|FLEX/}180
{else}180{endif}
G28; home
G0 X50 Y25 Z10 F2000
M117 Heating...
; soften temp for probing toolhead {filament_type[0]}
M109 R{if filament_type[0] == "EVA"}170
{elsif filament_type[0] == "HIPS"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] == "PET"}170
{elsif filament_type[0] == "PHA"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] == "SBS"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^ABS.*/}190
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^ASA.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PA.*|NYLON|CoPA/}220
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PC-.*|^PC/}220
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /PE|PE-CF|PET-CF/}190
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PETG.*|PCTG.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PLA.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PP.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /PVA|PVB|BVOH/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /TPU|TPE|FLEX/}180
{else}180{endif}
M82; set extruder to absolute mode
G92 E0; set extruder to zero
G1 E-7 F100; retract 7mm of filament on first extruder
M106; turn on fans to speed cooling
M117 Wiping...
;wipe temp for {filament_type[0]}
M109 R{if filament_type[0] == "EVA"}170{elsif filament_type[0] == "HIPS"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] == "PET"}170
{elsif filament_type[0] == "PHA"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] == "SBS"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^ABS.*/}190
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^ASA.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PA.*|NYLON|CoPA/}220
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PC-.*|^PC/}220
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /PE|PE-CF|PET-CF/}190
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PETG.*|PCTG.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PLA.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PP.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /PVA|PVB|BVOH/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /TPU|TPE|FLEX/}180
{else}180
{endif}G12; wipe sequence
M107; turn off fan
; probe temp for {filament_type[0]}
M109 R{if filament_type[0] == "EVA"}170{elsif filament_type[0] == "HIPS"}160
{elsif filament_type[0] == "PET"}170
{elsif filament_type[0] == "PHA"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] == "SBS"}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^ABS.*/}170
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^ASA.*/}170
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PA.*|NYLON|CoPA/}200
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PC-.*|^PC/}200
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /PE|PE-CF|PET-CF/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PETG.*|PCTG.*/}170
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PLA.*/}160
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /^PP.*/}180
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /PVA|PVB|BVOH/}160
{elsif filament_type[0] =~ /TPU|TPE|FLEX/}160
{else}170
{endif}G29; probe sequence (for auto-leveling)
M420 S1; enable leveling matrix
T{initial_tool}; ensure we're using the first extruder
M104 S{first_layer_temperature[initial_tool]}; set extruder temp
G0 X5 Y15 Z10 F5000; move to start location
M400; clear buffer
M117 Heating...
M109 R{first_layer_temperature[initial_tool]}; set extruder temp and waitnM190 R{bed_temperature_initial_layer[initial_tool]}; get bed temping up during first layer
G1 Z2 E0 F75; raise head and 0 extruder
M82; set to absolute mode
M400; clear buffer
M300 T; play sound at start of first layer
M117 Printing ...
;Start G-Code End
machine_end_gcode:
M400; wait for moves to finish
M140 S0; start cooling bed
M107; fans off
G91 ; relative positioning
G1 E-1 F300 ; retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z25 E-1 X20 Y20 F2000; move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
M104 S{nozzle_temperature[0]} T0 ; T0 to print temp
M104 S{nozzle_temperature[1]} T1 ; T1 to print temp
G90 ; absolute positioning
G0 X285 Y-30 F3000; move to cooling position
G91 ; relative positioning
M117 Purging for next print;progress indicator message
T0
M109 S{nozzle_temperature[0]}; wait for temp
G92 E0; set extruder position to purge amount
G1 E15 F75; purge
M400; wait for purge
M104 S0 ; T0 hotend off
T1
M109 S{nozzle_temperature[1]}; wait for temp
G92 E0; set extruder position to purge amount
G1 E15 F75; purge
M400; wait for purge
M104 S0 ; T1 hotend off
T0
M117 Cooling, please wait;progress indicator message
M190 S0; cool off bed
G0 Y280 F3000 ; present finished print
M77; stop GLCD timer
M18 X Y E; turn off x y and e axis
G90 ; absolute positioning
M117 Print complete; progress indicator message
